Name: Arkenlich

Traits.Name: Overdrive 6
Traits.Description: Attacks are all critical hits on hit at round 6 or later.

Traits.Name: Flying
Traits.Description: Ignores all terrain and terrain effects other than impassable terrain, and ignores engagement and obstruction.

Traits.Name: Dark Majesty
Traits.Description: Has phasing, evasion, and resistance. Lose this trait if all souls stones are destroyed.

BodyParts.Name: Soul Stones
BodyParts.Description: At the start of combat, summon soul stones equal to the number of players +1. Soul stones are size 1 summons with 10 hp, 6 defense, and the aetherwall trait that cannot be moved in any way. Each must be accessible to characters and placed at least range 6 from the arkenlich.

Actions.Name: Unholy
Actions.Effect: This action can also be made as a close blast 1 melee attack.

Actions.Name: Vile
Actions.Description: A foe in range 5 must save or become slowed, and until the end of their next turn, they take 1 piercing damage for each space they move.

Actions.Name: Finger of Death
Actions.Effect: This attack can't lower a character past 1 hp.

Actions.Name: Puppet Strings
Actions.Description: All foes must save or be shoved 2 in a direction of the lich's choice, or shoved 1 on a successful save.

PhasesDescription: The lich progress through its three phases in order (I>III, then back to I), starting with phase I, then swapping to the next phase each round.

Actions.Name: Soul Sacrifice
Actions.Description: At the start of this phase, all visible foes have their soul shoved out of their body and summoned in a location of the lich's choice within range 5 of them. The soul doesn't take action on its own, but can be targeted as if it was the original character for abilities and effects. Damage taken via a character's soul becomes Divine damage. A character can re-unite with their soul by moving into and ending their turn in its space, ending this effect.

Actions.Name: Entombment of Iz
Actions.Description: The Lich entombs a character in a magical sarcophagus. While inside, they are winded+, have their speed reduced to 0 and are blinded. The Sarcophagus is a height 1 terrain piece with 10 hp that is destructible. Attacks automatically hit and it is destroyed when it reaches 0. It has resistance to damage from the character inside it.

Actions.Name: Utterances of the Crawling Dead
Actions.Description: The lich begins incanting, reducing its max speed to 0 this round. It marks out an area 2 spaces around itself, which is visible to all characters. Every other part of the battlefield is filled with shifting darkness. If overdrive has activated, Utterances of the Crawling Dead does not mark a safe area. The lich's last turn this round is a slow turn, and it takes the Soul Annihilation action.

Actions.Name: Soul Annihilation
Actions.Description: All spaces outside the area marked by Utterances of the Crawling Dead erupt. Foes inside must save or take 100% of their max hp as piercing damage, or 50% on a successful save. This damage cannot reduce a character past 1 hp.
